name: Mutant Football
description:
MUTANT FOOTBALL

A nuke dropped, and the way to escape is blocked by 5 hardcore football fans...

Arrow Keys to Move (Down arrow makes you fall faster)

C - Jump

X - Kick Up

Z - Special Mutation Abilities

Due to the radiation from that nuke, you'll be mutating on your way to escape. Fırst mutation will occur at the start, second when the first guy is defeated(or lost to) and third when the 3rd guy is defeated(or lost to).  You start with a random stats that can be imroved with mutations. You can color your character with RGB colors. Try not to move too much in a duel, as you're also STARVING TO DEATH. Also there is no food in sight so lost food is lost. Your opponents will get more points per goal as you go on.

Coding and bad art by Mrinin, Music by Chris Gruchacz, Sound Effects by random guys on the Internet.

SC: https://soundcloud.com/chris_gruchacz
